subject: Re: Add folder and widgets under Employees section
preview: Hi Kasia,  So glad to hear that, always happy to help! 😊  Let me know if anything else comes up.  Cheers, Allie

full_threads.body:
Hi Kasia,

So glad to hear that, always happy to help! 😊

Let me know if anything else comes up.

Cheers,
Allie

Hi Allie,

That looks perfect, thank you so much for your help ☺️

Cheers
Kasia

Hey Kasia,

Just a quick follow-up, I’ve updated the employee page with the new tab structure, and MSDS documents are now filtered into their own section.

You can check it out here: https://completeplumbingdrainage.com.au/employees/

Let me know if everything’s working smoothly on your end or if there’s anything you’d like tweaked.

Thanks again for the helpful feedback!

Hi Kasia,

Thanks for the feedback!

You're absolutely right, having all documents on a single page might feel overwhelming, especially when there's a wide range of file types.

To keep things clean and user-friendly, we’ll implement a tab-based structure instead:
  • One tab specifically for MSDS documents, which will only show once selected.
  • Another general “All Documents” tab, which will still provide a full overview for convenience.

I'll be working on this and send you the updated version by tomorrow, July 17, as promised.

Let me know if you have any other preferences in the meantime!
Okay then will assign it back to you. Thanks!
all good on this working on this right now

action.text: Daphne Bautista assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Allie Borcena assigned to Daphne Bautista

full_threads.body:
Hi Abbie,

Looks good although the only thing I'm thinking is it may be too many documents on the one page which is why I thought if we have a msds documents widget and they need to select it, then only the msds document would be available?

Happy to leave media all in 1 section as I'm trying to be cautious of timing 😊

Thank you for checking

Hi Kasia,

Thanks! Just a quick check before I jump in, I’ve attached a screenshot. Would something like this work?

Also, folders in the media library won’t reflect on the page, but we can keep everything on one page and make it feel clear and organized.

Let me know what you think!

Hi Allie

Thank you for confirming.

Could we get the MSDS documents folder to be a big widget like the forms already there so it's more obvious to the end user?

Sorry I'm not able to access the media page link that's there? If we create folders within media library does that flow through to the web page? As I don't mind having it all on the one page?

Thanks

Kasia

Hi Kasia,

Thanks for sending this through!

Just to clarify before we set things up:
  • Are you looking to add a new section under the Employee tab specifically for the MSDS file list? We’ve attached a screenshot to confirm what that might look like.

  • For the media files, did you want us to create folders within the Media Library here: Media Page?

Once we have your confirmation, we’ll get everything sorted.

action.text: Daphne Bautista assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,


Could I please create a MSDS folder under the employee section and have all 22 documents which have just been added to media to be included in there. I'll rename the documents to be correct, but I just need the folder and widgets created.


If it can be the first widget to select that would be great.


Documents to be added in there:


If you need more details, please just let me know 😊


Cheers

Kasia
